ticket.title: Make GitHub integration non-interactive (GH_TOKEN) and lane-scoped (no ~/.config/gh dependence)

tickets.reason: Credential mounts + systemd credentials need to exist.
Lane-scoped HOME/XDG roots must be deterministic.

in_scope: Update GitHub-facing CLI flows to accept `GH_TOKEN` (injected) without requiring `gh auth login`.
Remove hard dependency on `gh auth status` when token-based auth is present.
Ensure GitHub CLI config dirs are lane-scoped (HOME/XDG_CONFIG_HOME), never user-global by default.
Ensure failures are deterministic and do not block `gates`.
out_of_scope: Replacing gh CLI with a pure-Rust GitHub client (optional future).

steps: Adjust readiness checks in `fac_review` to validate token-based auth paths.
Thread credential mounts into GitHub calls (GH_TOKEN env) and ensure redaction.

criteria: GitHub-facing workflows succeed with only `GH_TOKEN` provisioned via systemd credentials.
No requirement for interactive login or persistent ~/.config/gh state.
